name: Infralimbic parvalbumin neural activity facilitates cued threat avoidance
citation: Ho, Yi-Yun (2025) Infralimbic parvalbumin neural activity facilitates cued threat avoidance (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001356/draft
description: This dataset includes photometry recording in mouse vmPFC parvalbumin neuronal activity and mouse behavior under optogenetic suppression of this population during active avoidance behaviors.
